Rename a Variable

Source: R/utils_rename_if_possible.R
rename_if_possible.Rd

Rename a variable in a dataframe if applicable.

rename_if_possible(x, pattern, replacement)

Arguments

x

Dataframe.
pattern

Variable to replace.
replacement

New variable name.

Examples

rename_if_possible(iris, "Sepal.Length", "length")
#>     length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1      5.1         3.5          1.4         0.2     setosa
